thread.title: PHOTOS: 52 years ago, the coldest spell in Lincoln was just starting
thread.title_full: PHOTOS: 52 years ago, the coldest spell in Lincoln was just starting

author: LIncoln Journal Star
title: PHOTOS: 52 years ago, the coldest spell in Lincoln was just starting
text:
PHOTOS: 52 years ago, the coldest spell in Lincoln was just starting
Dec. 17, 1983, through Dec. 25 stands out in history as the coldest stretch in Lincoln history. The temperature dropped below 0 on Dec. 17 and didn't crack the positive side for 188 hours.
Here are some photos of how Lincoln handled the bitter chill.
188 hours of winter's chill
188 hours of winter's chill
188 hours of winter's chill
188 hours of winter's chill
188 hours of winter's chill
